name: Id cards Free Template ( Google Sync Ready )
description:
Hello, I'm Mozart Digital, I leave you this template to make id cards


For hiring me infantericardo@gmail.com


Google sync Instrucctions


Step 1 : Go to this link and make a copy of data template: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ym3plYM1VTBglXeLID1OXogYduVlyAjaMO-a7GYguSU/edit?usp=sharing


Step 2 : Search and install “Google Sync Plugin” or follow this link https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/735770583268406934


Step 3: Configure the plugin and fetch the data from your google sheet url. Before that you must publish your sheet in order to connect the plugin and data.


Step 4 : Run the script and that's all
